start.text_reactivated_profile: Welcome back! Your account has been reactivated.

main.text: This bot is designed to help you find the perfect flat or house for rent or purchase in Munich. It uses the ImmoScout24 API to search for properties based on your search criteria and sends you notifications when new offers match your search criteria. You can also set up multiple finders to search for different types of properties or different areas. You can also set up multiple finders to search for different types of properties or different areas.

settings_menu.text: Here you can set your preferences for the bot. You can set your address, distance, notifications, language, and more.

account.start: Welcome! Use /help to see available commands.
account.stopped: Your account has been paused. Use /start to resume. Use /delete_account to delete your account.
account.deleted: Your account has been deleted. All your data has been removed.
account.reactivated: Welcome back! Your account has been reactivated.
account.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
account.delete_cancel: Your account has not been deleted.

new_finder.new_finder_prompt: Choose the type of travel you want to use:
new_finder.duration_prompt: How long would you like to travel to the destination? (in minutes)
new_finder.new_finder_success:
New finder created successfully!
 You will start receiving notifications soon.
new_finder.offer_type_prompt: Choose the type of offer you want to use:

settings.language_changed: Your language has been changed to English.
settings.address_prompt: Please enter your address in the format: 'Street, House Number, Postal Code' (Munich city only):

address_set.title: Address is saved successfully:
address_set.commands: To see all available commands type /help

distance_set.title: Your search distance has been set to:
distance_set.commands: To see all available commands type /help

errors.unknown_command: Sorry, I didn't understand that command. Use /help to see available commands.

invalid_address.title: Address is not valid, check:
invalid_address.commands: To set address type /set_address. To see all available commands type /help

errors.invalid_distance: Please enter a valid distance (1-100 km).
errors.missing_parameters: Missing required information. Please try again.
errors.service_unavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.not_registered: Please send /start to register and use the bot.
errors.wrong_duration: Please enter a valid duration (1-100 minutes).
errors.no_address_set: Please set your address first. Use /set_address to set your address.

proposals.no_matches: No new matches found. We'll notify you when something comes up!

info_messages.no_offers: No offers according to your search criteria found.
info_messages.help:
Available commands:

/start - Start the bot
/stop - Stop the bot
/delete_account - Delete your account
/set_language - Set your language
/set_address - Set your address
/set_new_finder - Set a new finder
/set_notifications - Set notifications
/my_data - View your user data
/my_offers - View your offers
/delete_finder - Delete a finder
